IN FAVOR: A duly elected President who won over 80 million votes; a majority of House of Reps, & 50 Senators representing 62% of the American people 

OPPOSED: a minority of Senators representing a minority of the country.

1483981192462487558.text: So where did the current Senate Rule come from? It is a total invention of Senators that empowers a minority of Senators by disempowering the overwhelming majority of the American people. That’s what it is.

1390415976429150219.text: Good news: After we fought to create this program within the American Rescue Plan, the @FCC is rolling out the Emergency Broadband Benefit, which provides discounts for broadband & devices to families struggling to stay connected. Check it out here: https://t.co/j4BiBLnJR0

1390369557920075777.text: As President Biden has said, it is vital that we strengthen our relationships abroad and work to advance the rule of law, human rights, and the peaceful resolution of conflicts in order to bolster our prosperity and security here at home.

1390369556775030795.text: I want to thank all of the U.S. Embassy personnel at @USEmbassyKRT and @USAinUAE and other posts around the world for the work they do – often at great personal risk and sacrifice – to serve our country. I'm proud to be the Co-Chair of the Foreign Service Caucus.

1390369555650916355.text: Met with UAE leadership to exchange views and discuss our security partnership & ways to expand trade & investment. Also welcomed the Abraham Accords & removal of UAE forces from Yemen and noted the positive role they could play in resuming the JCPOA & reducing regional conflict.

1390369554480631809.text: Visited our troops at Al Dhafra Air Base to thank them for their service. They not only play a vital security role in the region, but will be facilitating the safe withdrawal of US forces from Afghanistan.

1390369553373347845.text: We began our trip in the UAE, which will be the site of the Dubai World Expo. In a sign for a more hopeful world, they are hosting pavilions from friends and foes alike.

1390369552316436483.text: We visited the Um Rakuba refugee camp to listen to the plight of people fleeing the Tigray Region of Ethiopia. Grateful to @USAID, @WFPUSA and @Refugees for their humanitarian efforts. The Biden Admin is doing everything it can to end the fighting in Ethiopia & resolve disputes.

1390369551305650182.text: Sudan is now home to over 3.6 million refugees and displaced people as a result of years of conflicts. Most recently there has been an influx of over 60,000 refugees fleeing the conflict in Ethiopia.

1390369550286393346.text: The new PM, Cabinet, & Sovereign Council are working diligently to move from authoritarian rule to rule of law and separation of religion & state. Important that the Armed Forces be placed under single command & that they proceed as planned to full civilian control of government.

1390369549229428739.text: The US has a key role to play in supporting Sudan’s journey from dictatorship toward democracy. The ousting of Bashir in the peaceful revolution about 2 years ago brings fresh hope and the US should be a full partner with the Sudanese people as they seek a better future.

1390369547950206981.text: Over the last few days, I traveled to Sudan and the UAE with @ChrisCoons as part of an official trip to support the transition to democracy in Sudan, promote relief to refugees of the conflict in Ethiopia, and meet with UAE leadership on issues of mutual interest and concern.

1243674813727735808.text:
5. How will I receive my payment? 

Payments are sent automatically and will be based on income information from your 2019 tax return, 2018 tax return, or Social Security/Railroad Retirement benefit record. If you don't receive an automatic payment, file a tax return to claim it.

1243674812528177152.text:
4. Will I get a $1,200 payment?

Yes, if you’re single making less than $75,000 or the head of household making less than $112,500. Married couples get $2,400 if they make under $150,000. Parents get $500 per child.

If you make more, check with this tool: https://t.co/zt48HLleMA

1243674811638984705.text:
3. How long can an unemployed individual receive benefits? 

You can receive up to 39 weeks of regular benefits, which is a 13-week increase from the current limit of 26 weeks. The additional $600 runs until July 31st.

1243674809692717063.text:
2. How much are unemployment benefits increased by?

$600 per week for 4 months. 

This is on top of current unemployment benefits which are on a scale from $50-$430 in Maryland—enough to replace the salaries of many workers. In our state, benefits could be up to $1,030 per week.

1243674804932280322.text:
1. How do I know if I qualify for unemployment benefits? 

If you were laid off, you are likely eligible. 

The Phase 3 package expands eligibility—adding self-employed, part-time, and gig economy workers—if they lost their job or income due to COVID-19. https://t.co/IhXaKHaqzZ
